name: Hand wash refill
title: Dettol No-Touch · Hand wash refill · Shea butter & rose extract
description: Dettol Hand wash refill Shea butter & rose extract

usageInformation.usage: To be used only with Dettol No-Touch soap dispenser. Application: 1. Switch off dispenser, press refill into dispenser until it clicks into place. Switch on the dispenser. 2. Hold moistened hands under the dispenser opening - soap is dispensed automatically. 3. Soap hands thoroughly, including nails and thumbs. Then rinse and dry hands.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Dettol No-Touch care soap with shea butter and rose essence is gentle on the skin and powerful against dirt. Its antibacterial formula offers a successful combination of daily care and protection. It leaves the skin feeling soft and cleans hygienically. Dettol No-Touch refills are available in different versions for your Dettol No-Touch soap dispenser. The combination of an automatic soap dispenser and antibacterial soap effectively combats the spread of bacteria on your hands. Since 1933, Dettol has been the expert in hygienic cleanliness and protecting your family - every day. Our ambition is to contribute to a healthy life. That's why we focus on preventing the spread of germs on hand surfaces. So that you can get on with the important things in life, whatever the circumstances!
